parameters.name: prepared_test_case
parameters.value: TestCaseModel(name='基础文件消息测试-ppt', description='测试发送 ppt 文件消息', category='positive', request=RequestModel(method='POST', endpoint='/open-apis/im/v1/messages', query_params={'receive_id_type': 'open_id'}, headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': 'Bearer $access_token$'}, body={'receive_id': '$open_id$', 'msg_type': 'file', 'content': {'__needs_json_encode': True, 'file_key': '$uploaded_file_key$'}, 'uuid': '$random_uuid$'}), expected=ExpectedModel(status_code=200, headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, schema=None, body={'code': 0, 'data': {'file_key': '@not_empty'}, 'msg': 'success'}), setup=[{'action': 'get_tenant_access_token', 'save_to': 'access_token'}, {'action': 'get_open_id', 'save_to': 'open_id'}, {'action': 'generate_uuid', 'save_to': 'random_uuid'}, {'action': 'upload_file', 'save_to': 'uploaded_file_key', 'file_path': 'tests/test_data/message/file/sample.ppt', 'file_type': 'ppt'}], teardown=[{'action': 'delete_message', 'params': {'message_id': '$response.data.message_id$'}}])
